H0.text: In which Jane Austen novel is Frederick Wentworth the lover of Anne Elliot. Pride and Prejudice

H1.text: In which Jane Austen novel is Frederick Wentworth the lover of Anne Elliot. Sense and Sensibility

H2.text: In which Jane Austen novel is Frederick Wentworth the lover of Anne Elliot. Emma

H3.text: In which Jane Austen novel is Frederick Wentworth the lover of Anne Elliot. Suasion

A4.text: The wife's brother, Captain Frederick Wentworth, was engaged to Anne in 1806, but the engagement was broken when Anne was persuaded by her friends and family to end their relationship.

A5.text: Anne and Captain Wentworth, both single and unattached, meet again after a separation lasting almost eight years, setting the scene for a second, well-considered chance at love and marriage for Anne.
